website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, made specifically for parakeets, and composed of the seeds, vegetables, and grains that these little birds enjoy, Bonanza is an all-around solid parakeet food.
pros: White proso millet seed, oats, and canary grass seed are the first 3 ingredients
Scientifically crafted to contain a parakeet’s nutritional needs
A mix of seeds and pellets
cons: This otherwise fine parakeet food contains both artificial colors and artificial orange flavor

customer_reviews.title: Just bought for our teddy bear hamsters. Both hamsters ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought for our teddy bear hamsters. Both hamsters died in days after eating. Hamsters are in separate cages and never together. Have no other explanation so cannot be sure. Will be reporting.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: My Cockatiel Like It.
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel has enjoyed this brand of food for many years. He eats it without any hesitation and that's what's important to me. After trying some of the more higher priced bird foods, which, in some cases, my bird refused to eat, I've returned to this old standby. No reason to spend money on the higher priced brands, if your bird refuses to eat them. Yes, I've heard all about how seed diets aren't right, and that pellets, or crumbles are better, but my bird has lived in this food for seventeen years. He likes it, and that is that. Have always been pleased with Hartz products. Always have been a good value bird food.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Sayes

customer_reviews.title: None of the doughnut-shaped treats like before. Perhaps Hartz has changed the product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Guinea Pigs. The product I got from amazon is not the same as what is shown here. The bag looks similar but is a lighter-blue color. Inside the bag, the blend is not the same as the Hartz Guinea Pig food I've bought in the past. The pellets are larger. A lot of papaya, pineapple and corn. None of the doughnut-shaped treats like before. Perhaps Hartz has changed the product...please beware.
customer_reviews.author: Hornet56

customer_reviews.title: My birds didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: My birds didn’t like it. I bought this as a filler that I add to my regular dietary birdseed. Wild harvest. Ordinarily I would use Kaytee Fiesta Birdseed. This bird seed had died products in it. It also had pellets in it. Some birds eat pellets mine will not. I go on the looks and instinct and this product fit none of those parameters for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nylle

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Value
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 guinea pigs and they live up to the pig part although this food met the nutritional needs of the pigs the food failed horribly. I was left with a little over a pound of dust at the bottom of the bag which I did weigh just to see. When you have that many mouths to feed that is a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Ashbrook

customer_reviews.title: has enjoyed Hartz Bonanza for years
customer_reviews.text: My 19-year-old cockatiel, Punky, has enjoyed Hartz Bonanza for years. Until I discovered this fine bird food, he'd eat about half of the other stuff and knock the other half of the el cheapo seed, all over the place He really loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C Marinoff

customer_reviews.title: SAMMIE LOVES THIS
customer_reviews.text: We nicknamed this crack for guinea pigs, whatever they put in it they love it. However after many years they changed the formula. There is one very thick piece he throws out of his cage. I mix this with oxbow, which is a more healthy food. He currently has leg cancer and doesn't have very long to live, so he will have everything he loves until the end. Here is Sammie with his friend, Gracie. They have been together from the first day I brought him home.
customer_reviews.author: holymoly

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not the best
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I don't taste their food, but, this one just looks less appetizing than others. It is 4# while most are 5# and unfortunately, the bottom of the bag was mostly crushed/crunched up like a bag of potato chips. I also notice that the piggies are not eating it as quickly as they have eaten other brands. I went out on a limb with this because other brands were out of stock but I won't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: he loved from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: To the Hartz Bonanza people: I hope that you guys read my comments on November 2017. I will buy this product again but if you guys did not the correct the mix adding more canary grass seed , I will return the package and move to another product. My Parakeet Luca says tank you in advance. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Dust and bugs in the bag
customer_reviews.text: We have a hamster and this bag not only did it have a ton of black crop bugs but a lot of dust so much that it gave my daughter an allergic reaction to the dust causing an eye infection. I purchased this bag in advanced so I wouldn’t run out on my current one. Needless to say I opened it a few days ago.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyM

customer_reviews.title: Hamsters love it
customer_reviews.text: My robo hamsters seem to love this one more then the last food I got them. It lasts us a decent amount of time and they stopped fighting over their food so much.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Flores

customer_reviews.title: The hamster ate it
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you that there is a nice mix of seeds and kibbles and the price is great for the amount we get. I can't say anything about the flavor, cause I didn't eat any. The hamster, however, dove right in and chowed down. He's still alive, so that says something about quality, too, I guess. I also included a picture of the hamster, cause he's so cute! I'd order this food again anytime I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Calabria IV

customer_reviews.title: The bird liked it, but we didn't.
customer_reviews.text: Our Alexandrine isn't a picky guy, and he certainly munched on this contentedly. My first clue that maybe this was going to be a one-time only purchase- the much touted easy open zip top seal died the second time I tied to open the bag. To add insult to injury, I think the bird food at Amazon sits in the warehouse for awhile; it was full of seed moths! I ended up throwing it out before we'd used 1/4 of the bag. So if you decide to bit the bullet and buy this, keep a bag clip handy and either store it in the freezer, or invest in some of those pantry moth pest traps.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna sais quoi

customer_reviews.title: Not all gerbils like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard for me to give this a rating because my gerbils would not eat it. It may be a favorite for some, but mine did not want anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ssrudy

customer_reviews.title: I would give it a 5 stars, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5 stars, but the bag was open and all the food was at the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Booker

customer_reviews.title: Hamster ignores half of the food
customer_reviews.text: Most of the food stays in the hamster bowl. I'd says when I change his food out about 2/3 of the food gets thrown out, he ignores the brown pellets and the millet looking seeds that comes in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Star Z.

customer_reviews.title: Our Hamster loveds it
customer_reviews.text: Hamster actually eats alll of this stuff. With cheap food he stashes the pellets and wil nto touch them unless we donlt feed him.
customer_reviews.author: PBK

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig likes it
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig likes this brand more than the last one I bought. It cost more and I get less than the other brand though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lien

customer_reviews.title: Got to Please Louie
customer_reviews.text: Louie loves this brand of food. My only complaint is a little too much peanuts in the blend. Since Louie loves it I’ll continue to buy it for him.
customer_reviews.author: alan fenick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and our little hamster loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I am always running out of hamster food. Then I started thinking about buying it here on Amazon -- a really big bag. And that's what came! Still using it months later and the hamster is plump and happy. Seems to be good tasting to him.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Overlock

customer_reviews.title: I like this food the best and so I ordered online ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this food the best and so I ordered online and my cockatiel who is almost 20 likes this the best because her favorite thing is the pellets. So if you want your cockatiel living long and healthy this is one of the things I have been feeding her.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: I didn't actually try this, but the hamster seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: We have one hamster, it's gonna last. This would really be along the lines of ordering a semi truck full of trail mix.
customer_reviews.author: Desert ape

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Decent .. has a lot of the little pellets my hamster doesn’t like. Not really a lot of other seeds and such.
customer_reviews.author: Christina karcher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product saved us lots of money and was delivered to our door. What more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My parakeets love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and I love the freshness of the bird food.
customer_reviews.author: sonia marques

customer_reviews.title: Only thing my cockatiel will eat
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this product has become hard to find. Local stores would carry it for a while and then switch to a "cheaper" brand that my bird does not like. It's great that we can have it automatically shippef from Amazon every few months. Just wish that it was a little cheaper. We still appreciate the 5% discount for using the periodic ordering option. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Hamster likes it
customer_reviews.text: seems that it is as nutritious as any other seed blend out there
customer_reviews.author: Oh Happy Day

customer_reviews.title: The gerbils don’t love it like other brands so I won’t buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: The gerbils don’t love it like other brands so I won’t buy it again but it’s not something they won’t eat at all.. just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1/2 price the grocery stores charge!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 1/2 the price of the grocery store chains! I use it to feed my backyard birds and squirrels...and other woodland critters.
customer_reviews.author: Mark - West Hartford, CT

customer_reviews.title: Hartz Guinea Pig Food
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs absolutely love this food. I have bought other brands and they wasted the majority of it. So from now on, this is the only guinea pig food I'll buy for them. My Lily and Daisy are very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Eats most
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pig doesn't like bigger sized pellets, but rest of it she will eat relatively fast. My sister's rabbit won't eat those either...
customer_reviews.author: npuc

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pigs hated the brand of food and I think it's because ...
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs hated the brand of food and I think it's because it was too "basic" for them. It didn't have enough treats in it in addition to the pellets. We went with a different brand after the bag was gone.
customer_reviews.author: N. Head

customer_reviews.title: My pigs love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used a food that my pigs eat BEFORE chewing on fresh hay. There are some larger food pieces they leave in their bowls, but overall great guinea food!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E.

customer_reviews.title: Picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why my parakeets are very fussy about their food. This is the only one they eat. They just throw other brands on floor.
customer_reviews.author: Zeltrek

customer_reviews.title: My bird absolutely loves this especially when I mix it ...
customer_reviews.text: My bird absolutely loves this especially when I mix it with Kaytee exact Rainbow. She was aggressive and mean before, now she is a totally changed bird!!!! Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rides1bigbroom

customer_reviews.title: 3 guinea pigs love it
customer_reviews.text: This bag lasted about 2 months with three guinea pigs feeding them 1/4 cup each per day. They liked it in combination with timothy grass.
customer_reviews.author: Jalopnik

customer_reviews.title: very good would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: it was very good considering the price. Arrived in good condition.Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MillMirMir24

customer_reviews.title: My daughters Guinea pig loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughters Guinea pig loves this stuff! I heard they are supposed to mainly eat the hay and just eat the food sometimes, not after I bought this..he finishes his bowl within the day! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: They love it and they are going strong
customer_reviews.text: Two parakeets have been eating this brand for 10 years now. They love it and they are going strong! Will continue to feed the this food
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: A healthy gourmet value
customer_reviews.text: Our hamsters love the mix, especially the pumpkin seeds. I only gave 1 star for flavor, because I didn't eat it🤣
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L.

customer_reviews.title: Very dusty
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea pig likes it, but it is VERY dusty
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lee

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome on how fast you get your product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to order comes on time will probably be doing a subscription for this if I can
customer_reviews.author: William Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs wont eat green pellets
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs will not eat the green pellets at all. They all the rest mixed in and just toss the pellets out.
customer_reviews.author: mrtwstrs

customer_reviews.title: My bird likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet likes this food. It doesn't have any weird colorful chunks in it like some other brands. He is able to eat all the different seeds.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the bird seed I buy at petsmart for double the cost! Same nutritional values.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, hard to find.
customer_reviews.text: This food has become outrageously expensive and hard to find. Not a good value for the $$$. Hard to find now, so I guess they can charge more. Probably my last bag.
customer_reviews.author: sandra s.

customer_reviews.title: My piggy loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I used it just as it arrived and my piggy was super happy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: yennissa

customer_reviews.title: Moth Infested
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten this food for awhile and it lasts a long time. Unfortunately today my daughter went to feed her hamster and the container was full of moths! It was disgusting and we had to throw the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Betler

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Matter my birds if they are happy I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Dannysran

customer_reviews.title: Bugs in it.
customer_reviews.text: There was literally bugs in the food, and amazon doesn’t give you the option to return it. I’m sure it would be a good food bought somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and discovered that their was a split in one of the bags of bird feed. Their was no plastic wrap so it got banged around. I was able to get most of the spilled bird seed. Just take more care in packing the items Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Our birds love this seed mix. Shipping was extremely fast.

customer_reviews.title: Good parakeet food!
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet enjoys this food. It is convenient to buy via Amazon and takes a few months for my bird to go through a full bag. The ziplock seal doesn't work very well, but I usually transfer the food into a Tupperware and that keeps it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: M in Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Bird loves it, did not like the packaging
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet is very picky and I was happy to get the food that was discontinued at our local store. However, the bag came with a hole in it and since the box had been mishandled as well (large hole in the box), some seed was missing. It would have been a very good idea to wrap the seed bag in another bag prior to shipping. Very bad packaging job.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Budgie approved!
customer_reviews.text: My budgies love it. They give it 5 beaks up!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Watterson

customer_reviews.title: Small animal food
customer_reviews.text: Mouse seems to like is it sense it’s eating 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Logan borgeson

customer_reviews.title: Can't vouch for the flavor but the Parrot seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Been using the product for years. Delivery was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce MacNeill

customer_reviews.title: Hartz, good as usual
customer_reviews.text: hey, it's basic bird seed, fortunately the one my parakeet likes best. Best part for me is having t delivered and not having t go to the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: cfalk1950

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and quantity, price beats the local pet store, who now is out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit treats
customer_reviews.text: I mix the treats with the rabbit food so it makes the food go further, along with feeding more rabbits. The rabbits seem to enjoy them, I mean they watch when I come inside their area with food.
customer_reviews.author: Donna3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little more sunflower seeds than expected, but the cockatiels are enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: Karmann

customer_reviews.title: Parakeets love this
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets love this food. It's also healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: kim karl

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig food
customer_reviews.text: I would've said that I liked this. It seemed really nutritional for my 2 guinea pigs. Unfortunately, they only ate the pellet parts and not the rest. so I kind of wasted my money as they wouldn't eat a huge portion of their food.
customer_reviews.author: JMBG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hamster Hayes dried veggies so this seed blend works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves it digs in it looking for all the food takes it to his little nest
customer_reviews.author: Michael182

customer_reviews.title: Bag was open with food spilling out
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped to me in a decent amount of time, BUT when it got here the bag was open with hamster food spilling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food
customer_reviews.text: I do not wish to order this product anymore until further notice. I haven't got my hamster yet. 6-4-19
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea pigs love this brand of guinea pig food and I will be giving it to all my future guinea pigs also
customer_reviews.author: Cindy MacRitchie

customer_reviews.title: Must be yummy!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? The guinea pigs are happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Heard

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Buy This Brand Again
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! Lots of the seeds in this bag are NOT for parakeets. My birds had to pick through to find enough seeds to eat. (One of my healthy parakeets died within a week of eating this seed, although I cannot say for sure what the cause of death was. My other four parakeets refused to eat the food after a day.) I stopped using this seed for my parakeets and used it instead in one of my wild bird feeders outside. After several species of wild birds tried it, they stopped eating it altogether. I finally threw out the seed, washed the container, and refilled it with my regular wild bird seed and the birds returned to feeding normally.
customer_reviews.author: Senoj

customer_reviews.title: It's the best there is
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Hartz Bonanza for my cockateal. It's the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leske

customer_reviews.title: Great Bird Food
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding this bird food to my parakeets for years now and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the convenience of the home delivery... I just find the price a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the Delivery and Subscription offer!
customer_reviews.text: My Umbrella Cockatoo is a very picky eater but she loves this food! I was very happy to subscribe and now every month on the 15 I have a new supply waiting on my doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: jessie0323

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: One of the many I have tried that my guinea pigs just will not eat. Guess it just depends on the taste of the guinea at that time.
customer_reviews.author: toshwaka

customer_reviews.title: Hartz is the best pet product manufactor.
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves it and would not eat anything else. He will probably out live me.LOL

customer_reviews.title: Item we got is different
customer_reviews.text: I saw good reviews and ordered it but what i got is "Parakeet Canary & Finch Nutritionally Compelte Blend" Lesson learnt check what you have ordered and what you got, It has lot of wheat and lentils, almost 20-30% is going waste, my birds are not enjoying it and feels bad to throw a cup full of seeds every 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva Chakilam

customer_reviews.title: We love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cockatiels who love this particular brand and it keeps them healthy. If I get hungry I throw it in a bowl with some milk and BAM I'm chirping all kinds of diddys all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baez

customer_reviews.title: Hartz Mountain Cockatiel Food
customer_reviews.text: Hart Mountain Bonanza food fed my cockatiel 23 years before the bird went to heaven. Enough said. Briefly tried other brands. Went back shortly thereafter. Sure they pick what they want of the seed you feed, just cut back and force them to eat all the seeds. Oh yeah other bird lived 22 years on Hartz Mountain seed. Neither had ever been to a vet. Oh yeah 3rd bird, "Bubbles," dining on Hartz Mountain. And It is Made in America.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is the healthiest, but it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: E. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum loves these pellets along with fresh carrots and hay
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: A very good parakeet food.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Hartz brand for about 20 years. This product stands up to the test of time. I have had several parakeets and even a dove love this food. My recent order first from amazon is of great quality. I seperated the four pound bag into different containers for easy feeding. My birds loved it.. I will buy again . Much cheaper to buy it here then a supermarket or box store.
customer_reviews.author: dmariat67

customer_reviews.title: They all love this seed with all the extras that Bonanza puts ...
customer_reviews.text: I have Cockatiels, Green Cheeks, Parrotlets and a Sun Conure, They all love this seed with all the extras that Bonanza puts in. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Sidell

customer_reviews.title: so happy I found in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The only food my Guinea pig well eat,so happy I found in Amazon
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: My Caiques Like it
customer_reviews.text: This has alot of the pellets and not as much seed.Id like it to have more seed.But my parrots still enjoy it.I just bought it again seeing one of my Caiques loves the Long monkey looking biscuits in it,Just bought it again for that very reason.I wouldnt have this as my only feed source seeing it doesn't have a ton of seed,but its great mixed with another feed that has more seed
customer_reviews.author: Long Toe Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This shows that the product has a lot of colorful/flavorful food bits when in reality the bag is mostly just the pellets. We were looking for a food with more than just pellets so this did not live up to our expectations. If the shipping wouldn't have been in play I would have returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: My parakeet loves this
customer_reviews.text: When he sees me filling his seed cup with this, my bird jumps right down to his feed perch. Apparently there are additional flavors in this particular brand of seed that have great taste for him, and you can see the different seeds that aren't usually seen in every-day parakeet seed. Wish I could find it locally.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenixx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has everything Pepper like and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pigs loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two guinea pigs because it has more variety than just pellets alone and it was a big hit with them! They really enjoy all of the extra stuff in it, like dried carrots and such. Good buy and I will continue to buy this kind for them.
customer_reviews.author: Myhauntedhouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bird seed my cockatoo will eat without throwing everything out of her cage.
customer_reviews.author: Nanna

customer_reviews.title: I love this food. Last just over 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for our one hamster. It lasts just over 6 months. It looks great. Polo, always picks out the pumpkins seeds first. I also like how it has fruit and grass pellets in it. This seems like really good food for hamsters.
customer_reviews.author: Diamante

customer_reviews.title: jjrharrison
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is the only food that my two guinea pigs eat until there is nothing left expect the corn kernels. No waste.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: that is the only food that my birds like they don't like anthing else. Since it is not carry in the local stores this is the only way that i can order.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE GUZMAN

customer_reviews.title: A parrot food that gets eaten
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if its a quirk of my Amazon parrot, but every other food I've tried, most of it usually gets thrown on the floor. This one he relishes! Very little is wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: my bird loves it
customer_reviews.text: ....MY BIRD LOVED THE BIRD FOOD.WHEN I GOT IT AND PUT IT IN HIS FEEDER HE WENT ABSOLUTLY NUTS OVER THE MANY DIFFERENT SEEDS INSIDE.FIRST THING MY BIRD WENT FOR WAS THE BITS OF FRUIT AND THE OAT GROATS IN PARTICULAR.HE LOVED IT ALL BUT THAT WAS HIS FAVORITE PART OF THE PRODUCT....SINCERELY DARRELL
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Ballein

customer_reviews.title: it works great. Both Hamsters are still alive
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it works great. Both Hamsters are still alive. Maybe if we increase the beef that can get little hammie heart attacks. Then I would have one less rodent spending a week per month in my walls.
customer_reviews.author: julie rupert

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's hamster loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's better to purchase stuff online. Offers are better than local pet stores occasionally. My daughter's hamster loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Patches the Rescue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This saves us money ever time when ever my bird needs food we get it here never any where else "tweedy" loves to eat as well he is a yellow red wing parrot he talks amazing fun bird deserves the best
customer_reviews.author: Leah Beth-Alchmy

customer_reviews.text: Would have liked it to have a reseable bag for the amount of money. My bird really likes it
customer_reviews.author: Betty B.

product_meta.title: Hartz Bonanza 4-Pound Gourmet Diet Supply
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:ParakeetScientifically formulated for Parakeets. Hartz Bonanza Health & Vitality Blend Parakeet Diet contains a variety of hand-selected, great-tasting, healthy ingredients which promotes optimal consumption and aids in providing balanced nutrition. Hartz Bonanza Health & Vitality Blend Parakeet Diet is also vitamin fortified for your bird’s well-being: • Vitamin A helps support eye, skin and immune system health. • Vitamin D helps birds effectively use calcium and supports bone health. • Vitamin E acts as an antioxidant and helps maintain healthy cells. • Omega Fatty Acids help promote healthy skin & vibrant feathers. Feeding Instructions: Feed your bird 1 to 3 tablespoons of this formula every day. Adjust amount up or down accordingly to maintain proper weight. Empty leftovers and refresh the cup every day. Always provide clean, fresh water. Tips: For best results when introducing a new food, begin with a mixture of current and new food to allow time for your pet bird to adjust to the transition. Gradually increase the amount of new food for 7-10 days. Store in a cool, dry place.
feature_bullets: Nutritious Blend Of Tasty Wholesome Ingredients Including Quality Grains Seeds, Fruits And Vegetables.
Hartz Triple-Fresh Seal Packaging Protects The Freshness And Flavor Of Your Pet'S Food; The Zip-Pak Slider Makes Pouring And Sealing A Cinch.
